name: northifytool
title: Northify Tool
author: Saienai
description:
Provides a selection tool to rotate all selected tiles to their 'original' position. Works for all tiles (hazard concrete, landfill variations, etc). 
 If bob adjustable inserters are used, also provides a selection tool to rotate all selected inserters to face north without changing their pickup/dropoff locations. 
 Has an option to set all inserters placed by robots to be north facing automatically.
